casebody.data:
NOEL ESTATE, Incorporated, and Thomas G. Roberts, Appellants, v. James R. RUSSELL, Shareholders' Agent of the Commercial National Bank of Shreveport, Appellee. No. 15028. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Feb. 18, 1955. Rehearing Denied April 6, 1955. Frederick J. Stewart, Shreveport, La., for appellants. T. Haller Jackson, Jr., H. M. Holder, Shreveport, La., Tucker, Bronson & Martin, Shreveport, La., of counsel, for ap-pellee.

Before HOLMES and BORAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed. 114 F.Supp. 614.
